Name: Shinobi Shift
About the game: Shinobi Shift is a first-person platformer with shooter elements where you can control the time! Rewind, slow down and even freeze time as you break through neon locations and hordes of enemies, throwing shurikens in different directions! Features Cinematic gameplay that makes you feel like an action hero Bright and catchy cyberpunk graphics Interesting levels that challenge the player with their difficulty
Meta Title: Shinobi Shift: Oct 8, 2021, Semyon Maximov and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Shinobi Shift? Check out the release date (Oct 8, 2021), developer insights from Semyon Maximov, and a complete game summary.
